titleStmt.title: Advice to the clergy of the diocese of Lincoln by ... James Lord Bishop of that diocese, in order to his primary visitation.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, James, 1637-1705.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition with additions, corrected.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
